activities: Brocade processes certain Personal Data that it collects during the job interview process, at the start of an individual’s employment, during the course of an individual’s employment and after an individual’s termination of employment. Brocade may collect, use and otherwise process Personal Data for employment-related purposes including, but not limited to: (1) facilitate global cooperation, communication and team work within and between Brocade and the Brocade companies outside the US to ensure access to company computer networks and systems, and to provide for a global personnel directory; (2) plan and manage human resources functions; (3) provide third party equity and benefit plans administration services and fulfil essential functions with regard to equity and benefit plans; (4) control access to facilities, safeguard and protect data held and prevent security breaches; (5) fulfil employer-related functions or obligations; and (6) comply with legal or ethics obligations, to conduct investigations, or as otherwise required or permitted by law.
contacttitle1: Senior Director, HR Strategy and Programs
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
